name: OR_CASE_WK_COMP
description: This table contains information related to OR Case Worker's Comp claims.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADJ_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: Adjuster's phone number for worker's comp.

columns.name: INJURY_DATE
columns.description: Date of injury for worker's comp.
